This year, Hazlewood Castle & Spa & Berry's Tennis Event are partnering with Martin House Children's Hospice as our chosen charity. For more than 35 years Martin House Childrenâ€™s Hospice has supported children and young people with life-limiting conditions, giving families rest, reassurance, comfort and support when they need it most. Martin House provides specialist care to families across West, North and East Yorkshire. They provide family-led care for babies, children and young people, allowing families to access the expertise of their team of nurses, doctors and therapists 24/7, 365 days a year. They offer personalised, holistic care which can be provided within the hospice, at home or in hospital. Every year they: Â· Offer care 24/7 â€“ 365 days a year Â· Support over 440 children and young people Â· Offer over 160 families bereavement support This year, Martin House has embarked on its biggest transformation yet, THE BUILD! Since first opening its doors, much has changed in palliative care as well as with the needs of families, medical research and professional training. THE BUILD will enable Martin House to continue to be there for children, young people and their families for many years to come. They are on a mission to raise Â£2 million from the public to transform Martin House. The plans to transform Martin House have been created in collaboration with the families using our hospice, ensuring their needs are at the centre of THE BUILD. To find out more about this amazing charity, visit their website: https://lnkd.in/g82qHfM Berry's Tennis Event will help with fundraising, and help give families in need the hospice they deserve. At Hazlewood Castle, we feel privileged to be working closely with Martin's House for Berry's Tennis Event. At the event, a charity silent auction will take place, run by Impulse Decisions.

Berry's Tennis event is just around the corner, and we can't wait! But first, we are delighted to announce that Mikael Pernfors will be joining us on court at Hazlewood Castle!
